audioText: J'en ai marre de ces embouteillages tous les matins !
question: J'en ai ______ de ces embouteillages tous les matins !
explanation: The text states 'J'en ai marre de ces embouteillages tous les matins !' - I'm fed up with these traffic jams every morning! 'En avoir marre' is a fixed expression meaning to be fed up with something, 'embouteillages' means traffic jams, and 'matins' means mornings.
